item.title: About
item.description: Greetings! I’m Nuttaphat Arunoprayoch (Sean), a results-driven Full-Stack Developer with extensive experience in AI-powered monitoring and automation platforms, and scalable web systems. I have a proven track record in designing innovative solutions that optimize workflows and reduce costs. I am an expert in web development and cutting-edge technologies, with hands-on experience across the entire SDLC. Experience With a rich background in utilizing Python for diverse projects and applications, including web frameworks like Flask, FastAPI, and Django, I bring a wealth of expertise to API development, data manipulation, and visualization.
